Package ca.corefacility.gview.managers.labels

Provides for classes to handle management of labels.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FeatureLabelRanker
    Defines how to assign rankings to the labels of Features.

    Used to reposition a label depending on zoom levels/keep track of these zoom levels.
    LabelsFilterer
    Used to determine which labels to remove to minimize overlap.

    Keeps track of which labels are in which slots, so they can be positioned correctly

    Handles laying out of the labels on the map.

    Handles laying out of the labels on the map.

    Stores a collection of labels with different rankings.
    LocationLabelRanker

    Represents the position (in a dimension and seq point) as well as the range where this position is active.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LabelRank  

Package ca.corefacility.gview.managers.labels Description

Provides for classes to handle management of labels. Includes creation/destruction of labels, positioning, and changing the density of the labels.
